snippet.title: DRACULA 5 : THE BLOOD LEGACY - TRAILER US - MICROÏDS - PC MAC IOS ANDROID
snippet.description:
Join us on Facebook (http://bit.ly/bioA5b) and on Twitter (http://bit.ly/apnV9H) 
The Official website : http://www.dracula.microids.com/


Will you dare to face the Prince of Darkness?

Back at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, Ellen Cross finally unveils the Dracula Portrait that she's brought back from Istanbul. This highly prized work was unfortunately stolen during its first night in New York. While tracking the thief, Ellen discovers new information on the Shadow of the Dragon—the mysterious brotherhood that the famous Vlad Tepes might have been affiliated with.

Dracula 5 : The Blood Legacy is available on PC and soon Mac, iOS and Android.

Follow us :

http://www.facebook.com/microids 
and 
http://www.facebook.com/Dracula.series

Twitter : http://www.twitter.com/microids_off
